description: ANVIL: Execute 'hello.py' using the sovereign Anvil runtime (static binary).
command: ./oss_sovereignty/sys_09_Anvil/build/anvil oss_sovereignty/sys_09_Anvil/hello.py
result: SUCCESS: >> HELLO WORLD FROM THE ANVIL

description: ANVIL: Verify global binary installation with a new hello world.
command: anvil -c "print('ANVIL GLOBAL: HELLO WORLD')"

description: SYSTEM: Deep scan for non-essential documentation, tests, and static assets.
command: find . -type d -name 'doc' -o -name 'docs' ...
result: IDENTIFIED: ~15.8 MB of removable content (Sphinx docs, Tests, Windows/Zephyr ports).

description: KERNEL: Analyze and strip unused kernel modules (fs, raid, virt).
command: sudo modprobe -r btrfs raid10 ...
result: SUCCESS: Stripped btrfs, raid*, kvm, joydev, wacom. Kept: wifi, bt, video, sound.

description: SECURITY: Scan userland binaries and identify Anvil violations (compilers, interpreters, net-tools).
command: python3 scan_binaries.py && python3 analyze_bloat.py
result: FLAGGED: 158 binaries (~279MB) for removal. (apt, make, curl, perl, etc.)

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Initialize directory structure for new systems: HyperVision and AlloyDB.
command: mkdir -p oss_sovereignty/sys_10_HyperVision oss_sovereignty/sys_11_AlloyDB

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Map flagged legacy binaries to sovereignty cards.
command: python3 create_bin_folders.py
result: SUCCESS: Created 158 binary placeholders in oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin.

description: SOVEREIGNTY TEST: Assimilate 'curl' (legacy_bin) from public repo. Clone, Kill Git, Mark.
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/curl https://github.com/curl/curl.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated curl. Git severed. Metadata marked.

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Assimilate Linux Kernel source (Depth 1).
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/sys_01_Linux_Kernel https://github.com/torvalds/linux.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated Linux Kernel (Torvalds/Linux). Git severed.

description: SOVEREIGNTY: Assimilate SELinux Userspace tools and libraries.
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/sys_02_SELinux https://github.com/SELinuxProject/selinux.git
result: SUCCESS: Assimilated SELinux Project. Git severed.

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 11: Assimilate perl5.38-x86_64-linux-gnu, perl5.38.2, perlbug, perlcalls-bpfcc, perldoc
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perl5.38-x86_64-linux-gnu https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perl5.38.2 https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlbug https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlcalls-bpfcc https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perldoc https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 12: Assimilate perlflow-bpfcc, perlivp, perlstat-bpfcc, perlthanks, phpcalls-bpfcc
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlflow-bpfcc https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlivp https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlstat-bpfcc https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/perlthanks https://github.com/Perl/perl5.git && echo 'SKIPPING phpcalls-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND'

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 13: Assimilate phpflow-bpfcc, phpstat-bpfcc, python3.12, rsync, rubycalls-bpfcc
command: echo 'SKIPPING phpflow-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && echo 'SKIPPING phpstat-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/INTERPRETERS/python3.12 https://github.com/python/cpython.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/rsync https://github.com/WayneD/rsync.git && echo 'SKIPPING rubycalls-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND'

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 14: Assimilate rubyflow-bpfcc, rubygc-bpfcc, rubyobjnew-bpfcc, rubystat-bpfcc, scp
command: echo 'SKIPPING rubyflow-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && echo 'SKIPPING rubygc-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && echo 'SKIPPING rubyobjnew-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && echo 'SKIPPING rubystat-bpfcc - NO URL FOUND' && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/scp https://github.com/openssh/openssh-portable.git

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 15: Assimilate sftp, snap, snapfuse, ssh, vim.basic
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/sftp https://github.com/openssh/openssh-portable.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/PACKAGE_MGMT/snap https://github.com/snapcore/snapd.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/PACKAGE_MGMT/snapfuse https://github.com/snapcore/snapd.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/ssh https://github.com/openssh/openssh-portable.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/EDITORS_DOCS/vim.basic https://github.com/vim/vim.git

description: SOVEREIGNTY BATCH 16: Assimilate vim.tiny, vimtutor, wget
command: python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/EDITORS_DOCS/vim.tiny https://github.com/vim/vim.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/EDITORS_DOCS/vimtutor https://github.com/vim/vim.git && python3 system/scripts/assimilate.py oss_sovereignty/legacy_bin/NETWORK_CLIENTS/wget https://git.savannah.gnu.org/git/wget.git
